text: (upbeat electronic music)

- I'm Leeor Moses, VP of
Business Development & Alliances.
- Hi, I'm Ori Goshen.
I'm the co-founder and co-CEO.

- There's no doubt that
generative AI has been top-of-mind
for organizations in the past six months.

But most customers are
still in the process

of determining their
organization's strategy around it.

AI21 Labs has been in the
forefront of the field since 2017,

with our proprietary,
in-house-developed family
of language models we call Jurassic.
Amazon Bedrock is the easiest way
for AWS customers to use Jurassic models.
It handles backend operation,

including infrastructure,
reducing complexity down
to a simple API call.
With Jurassic, businesses can leverage
the powerful capabilities of generative AI

to accelerate innovation,
unlock new possibilities,
and scale productivity.
- Jurassic is our series
of best-in-class large language models,

powering language generation
and comprehension features
in thousands of live applications.
Jurassic comes production-ready,
bringing top-tier quality, flexibility,

and high performance
that enable businesses

to easily build gen-AI-based
applications and services.

AI21 Labs is the only
foundation model vendor

with a track record of
successfully bringing AI
to the business world
with our award-winning virgin applications

that serve tens of millions
of users worldwide.
All Jurassic models were trained
on a massive corpus of text,
making them highly versatile
general purpose text generators

capable of understanding
and generating nuanced texts

in a wide variety of
industries and sectors.

Jurassic excels at following
natural language instructions
and contexts without requiring examples.

Jurassic is multilingual,
supporting six other languages
in addition to English,
languages like Spanish, French, German,
Italian, Portuguese, and Dutch.

Popular use cases include
question answering, summarization,

classification, assistive
creative text generation,
and many others.

Specifically, our retail
customers use Jurassic
to generate product descriptions according

to their desired tone,
length, and purpose.

Other customers in industries
such as health care
and financial services use Jurassic models

to create a natural language
interface to their documents,
policies, and info sheets,
allowing users to interact with the data

in natural language and
gain insights with ease.
These are just a few examples.
There are so many more use cases.
- Generative AI can serve many use cases.
Understanding the real value
that sits behind the use case is key.
Together with understanding the limitation

of the technology, taking
all this into account,
and really thinking about the value

and where it will fit
most in the organization

would be what you need for
a successful implementation.

- I think people should
really get work backwards.
Start with the business value

and the opportunities that
this technology enables,
and then plan accordingly.

Start experimenting with
what the models can do.

Get it in the hands of
customers and users.

And then, gradually roll
it out to production.
(upbeat electronic music)
